body:
use `WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR` as cause for `RespondWorkflowTaskFailed` if user workflow logic is non-deterministic

Ref: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/1726

comments.body: FYI this requires organizing and categorizing pretty much everywhere errors can be thrown in the SDK, which is potentially quite a lot of work/change.
We'll (hopefully) be looking into doing this soon

title: Use `WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR` for non-deterministic workflow
